reasoning.keyword_integration: Integrated top keywords: 'kettlebell' (26K), 'kettle bell' (25K), '8kg kettlebell' (13K), 'cast iron kettlebell' (5K), 'home gym equipment' (3.7K). Used verified black color and key features from product images.
